<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Animated Statue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=20)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Animated statues are often used to guard crypts, small shrines, or areas in government buildings where they can be positioned amid normal statues to hide their true nature until an intruder arouses their ire. Adventurers’ suspicions regarding statues suddenly animating and attacking has led many less scrupulous adventurers to automatically attack any statues they encounter, ruining harmless, ancient relics.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Animated Statue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=20)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 21</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** -2

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 (15 when broken); construct armor

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 35

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, an animated statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once an animated statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 15.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +11 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

</column>
